item.description:
Geoff's first... Over the Top... Rock Climbing Competition!

Yes, you can bribe the judges. We will hold these informal - very low key competitions - at Metro Rock starting at 11AM. If you win, you will get a free frozen turkey - or a frozen squash if you are a vegetarian. If you don't want to cook it, you can cook it at my place later in the day.

Categories of the extreme: 1) most silly climber, 2) fastest climber 3) fastest newbie 4) hardest bouldering stuff 5) easiest climb that looked the hardest, AND 6) best climb and Yo-Yo er...


People should sign up now to be judges or sign up later or on the spot. People should bring their pot-luck for eating later...

New climbers are welcome - make sure you contact Metro Rock before hand if you need a class or need to be belay tested. Look up Metro Rock's website for detailed directions to this nice gym.

$5 Dollar suggest donation to me for paying for this site and loosing top-roping equipment. (Yea, I know you gota pay the Metro Rock guys 2 but hey...)

Call me if you have any questions,
Geoff
617 501-6217
item.name: Rock Climbing Competition
